title: Capricornia utopia
creator_credit: Ian Austin, Robinson-Jones and George Patterson-Noble Bartlett
brief_description: A film about Australian industries and manufacture in the Rockhampton region of Queensland. Outlines the social, historical, community and rural life including the Flying Doctor Service, the mining areas and Tooloa. Cast features Eric Oldfield and Sharron Fisher with narration by Don McTaggart.
